K10D0154_H0155:303a-1: a'arya s'a ga ra n'a ga r'a dza pa ri pritstsha n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10D0154_H0155:303a-3: 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo //
K10D0154_H0155:303a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0154_H0155:303a-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0154_H0155:303a-7: bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po na klu'i rgyal
K10D0154_H0155:303a-8: po rgya mtshos gnas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i 'khor
K10D0154_H0155:303a-9: gyi khyams bkod pa na dge slong brgyad stong gi
K10D0154_H0155:303a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu'i
K10D0154_H0155:303a-12: 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa mngon par shes
K10D0154_H0155:303a-13: pa rab tu mang po dang /
K10D0154_H0155:303a-24: lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
K10D0154_H0155:303a-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan
K10D0154_H0155:303b-0: pa'i 'khor de 'dus par @303b mkhyen nas klu'i rgyal
K10D0154_H0155:303b-1: po rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0154_H0155:303b-3: kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni /
K10D0154_H0155:303b-4: las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bskyod nas sems kyi
K10D0154_H0155:303b-5: dmigs pa sna tshogs kyis las rnam pa sna tshogs
K10D0154_H0155:303b-6: mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed de
K10D0154_H0155:303b-7: / de yis 'gro ba'ang sna tshogs su gyur to //
K10D0154_H0155:303b-10: rgya mtsho chen po 'di na gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa dang /
K10D0154_H0155:303b-11: gzugs tha mal pa ji snyed snang ba la ltos /
K10D0154_H0155:303b-17: yid kyi las dge ba dang /
K10D0154_H0155:303b-18: mi dge ba sna tshogs su byas pas sna tshogs su gyur pa dag go /
K10D0154_H0155:303b-25: bcos ma sgrub pas gnas pa'i mtshan nyid de /
K10D0154_H0155:303b-30: las ji ltar bsags pas bsgrubs pa sna tshogs su byas pa dag ste /
K10D0154_H0155:303b-31: 'di la byed pa bo gang yang med do //
K10D0154_H0155:303b-33: 'di ltar chos 'di dag thams cad ni /
K10D0154_H0155:303b-34: bsam gyis mi khyab pa sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do //
K10D0154_H0155:303b-36: de la byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas chos thams
K10D0154_H0155:303b-37: cad sgrub pas gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shes nas
K10D0154_H0155:303b-38: dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba dag mngon
K10D0154_H0155:304a-0: par 'du bya'o // de dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba dag mngon par 'du @304a *//
K10D0154_H0155:304a-1: byed na; sgrub pas gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams kyi phung po dang /
K10D0154_H0155:304a-3: skye mched gang dag mngon par 'grub pa de dag
K10D0154_H0155:304a-4: mdzes shing blta na sdug la gzugs bzang ba dag
K10D0154_H0155:304a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsod nams bye ba khrag
K10D0154_H0155:304a-8: khrig brgya stong las skyes pa mtshan rnams kyis ji
K10D0154_H0155:304a-11: dpal gyis lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas ma chags par bzhugs te /
K10D0154_H0155:304a-12: gang na brgya stong phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba'i
K10D0154_H0155:304a-13: tshangs pa chen po 'di dag mog mog por gyur
K10D0154_H0155:304a-14: nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la blta na'ang mig
K10D0154_H0155:304a-15: zi zi bar gyur pa la ltos /
K10D0154_H0155:304a-17: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi gzugs dang; mtshan dang /
K10D0154_H0155:304a-22: dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba rnams kyis
K10D0154_H0155:304a-23: mngon par 'dus byas pas brgyan pa bsgrubs pa'o; ;klu'i
K10D0154_H0155:304a-24: bdag po / khyod kyi bkod pa 'di dang bsod nams thams cad las byung ba'o //
K10D0154_H0155:304a-39: mi ma yin pa 'di dag gi bkod pa gang
K10D0154_H0155:304b-0: yin pa de dag thams cad @304b kyang bsod nams
K10D0154_H0155:304b-1: las byung ba'o // klu'i bdag po /
K10D0154_H0155:304b-2: rgya mtsho chen po 'di na gang dag lus sna
K10D0154_H0155:304b-3: tshogs gzugs mi sdug cing dbyibs ma legs pa dang
K10D0154_H0155:304b-5: lus rags zhing che ba rnams dang /
K10D0154_H0155:304b-6: gang dag lus phra zhing chud pa de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi sems dang /
K10D0154_H0155:304b-9: yid kyi las dge ba dang /
K10D0154_H0155:304b-10: mi dge bas sna tshogs su gyur pa dag go /
K10D0154_H0155:304b-14: las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa /
K10D0154_H0155:304b-16: las kyi rnam par smin pa la brten par bya'o //
K10D0154_H0155:304b-18: khyed kyis de ltar slobs shig dang /
K10D0154_H0155:304b-20: las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa /
K10D0154_H0155:304b-21: las kyi rnam par smin pa la brten pa khyed
K10D0154_H0155:304b-22: dge ba'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba la blo
K10D0154_H0155:304b-24: lta ba chud gson par byed par mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0154_H0155:304b-25: chad pa dang rtag par lta ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0154_H0155:304b-26: khyed kyis sbyin pa'i gnas rnams mgu bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0154_H0155:304b-27: mgu bar byas nas kyang bsti stang byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0154_H0155:304b-28: bsti stang byas pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i lha dang
K10D0154_H0155:304b-29: bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsti stang byed par 'gyur
K10D0154_H0155:304b-31: chos gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi ngan 'gro
K10D0154_H0155:304b-32: ngan song mi khom pa'i lam thams cad yang dag
K10D0154_H0155:304b-33: par gcod do // chos gcig po gang zhe na /
K10D0154_H0155:305a-0: bdag ji ltar gyur cing nyin zhag rnams 'gro zhig gu snyam du dge ba'i chos rnams @305a *//
K10D0154_H0155:305a-2: de de ltar dge ba'i chos la rab tu rtog pa med pas mi dge ba'i sems dang /
K10D0154_H0155:305a-3: sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyi go skabs mi 'byed do //
K10D0154_H0155:305a-4: de mi dge ba'i chos spangs te dge ba'i chos
K10D0154_H0155:305a-5: dang ldan pas bsam pa dag pa'i sems can 'di
K10D0154_H0155:305a-9: rang sangs rgyas rnams dang 'grogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0154_H0155:305a-11: de la dge ba'i chos rnams gang zhe na /
K10D0154_H0155:305a-12: dge ba'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni /
K10D0154_H0155:305a-14: mi'i phun sum tshogs pa'i rtsa ba dang /
K10D0154_H0155:305a-17: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rtsa ba dang /
K10D0154_H0155:305a-19: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rtsa ba dang /
K10D0154_H0155:305a-23: gang 'di dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams so //
K10D0154_H0155:305a-24: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de dag kyang gang zhe na /
K10D0154_H0155:305a-26: srog gcod pa spong ba dang /
K10D0154_H0155:305a-27: ma byin par len pa dang /
K10D0154_H0155:305a-28: 'dod pa la log par g-yen pa dang /
K10D0154_H0155:305a-35: log par lta ba spong ba'o //
K10D0154_H0155:305a-37: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam zhes bya ste /
K10D0154_H0155:305a-39: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyi rtsa ba dang /
K10D0154_H0155:305b-0: klu'i bdag @305b po; ;de la srog gcod pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10D0154_H0155:305b-1: rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos bcu thob bo //
K10D0154_H0155:305b-4: 'dis sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa byin
K10D0154_H0155:305b-5: pa yin no; ;de sems can thams cad la byams
K10D0154_H0155:305b-6: par dmigs pa la gnas pa yin no //
K10D0154_H0155:305b-7: de'i zhe sdang gi bag chags yang dag par chad pa yin no //
K10D0154_H0155:305b-8: des nad nyung bar 'gyur bar sgrub pa yongs su bzung ba yin no //
K10D0154_H0155:305b-9: des tshe ring bar 'gyur ba'i sa bon btab pa yin no //
K10D0154_H0155:305b-10: de la mi ma yin pa rnams kyang srung ba dang /
K10D0154_H0155:305b-13: bde bar nyal zhing bde bar sang pa dang /
K10D0154_H0155:305b-14: sdig pa'i rmi lam mi mthong ba yin no //
K10D0154_H0155:305b-15: de nyal ba na'ang lha rnams sgrub par byed do //
K10D0154_H0155:305b-16: de la shar gnyer pa med pa yin te /
K10D0154_H0155:305b-17: shar gnyer ba'i bag la nyal med pa yin no //
K10D0154_H0155:305b-18: ngan 'gro thams cad kyis mi 'jigs pa dang /
K10D0154_H0155:305b-19: shi 'phos nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig
K10D0154_H0155:305b-20: rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur
K10D0154_H0155:305b-22: srog gcod pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni;
K10D0154_H0155:305b-23: rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos bcu po de
K10D0154_H0155:305b-24: dag thob bo // srog gcod pa spangs pa'i dge
K10D0154_H0155:305b-25: ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa
K10D0154_H0155:305b-26: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
K10D0154_H0155:305b-27: dag thob bo // bsngo na / de dge ba'i
K10D0154_H0155:305b-28: rtsa ba des byang chub thob pa na sems kyi
K10D0154_H0155:305b-29: dbang gis tshe tshad med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0154_H0155:305b-31: ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10D0154_H0155:306a-0: yid brtan pa'i chos bcu thob @306a *//
K10D0154_H0155:306a-3: longs spyod che zhing de'i longs spyod de nas rgyal po dang /
K10D0154_H0155:306a-8: nye mtshams kyis mi 'phrog pa yin no //
K10D0154_H0155:306a-9: skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong bas skye bo mang po dga' ba yin no //
K10D0154_H0155:306a-10: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa yin no //
K10D0154_H0155:306a-11: nor 'brel pa rnams la yid brtan du rung ba yin no //
K10D0154_H0155:306a-13: phyogs mtshams rnams su de'i bsngags pa brjod cing de
K10D0154_H0155:306a-14: la pha rol gyi gnod pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad
K10D0154_H0155:306a-16: de'i dge ba brjod pa'i sgra dang /
K10D0154_H0155:306a-17: tshigs su bcad pa mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro //
K10D0154_H0155:306a-18: bag tsha ba med par 'khor gyi nang du 'jug ste zhum zhum po med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0154_H0155:306a-25: phyug pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K10D0154_H0155:306a-26: de'i sems sbyin pa yang dag par 'god pa la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0154_H0155:306a-27: lus dang bral nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi
K10D0154_H0155:306a-28: 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar
K10D0154_H0155:306a-30: de ltar ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10D0154_H0155:306a-31: yid brtan pa'i chos bcu po de dag thob bo //
K10D0154_H0155:306a-32: ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
K10D0154_H0155:306a-33: ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag
K10D0154_H0155:306a-34: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na
K10D0154_H0155:306b-0: / de dge ba'i rtsa @306b des de bzhin gshegs
K10D0154_H0155:306b-1: pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i
K10D0154_H0155:306b-2: ye shes can du rang gi mngon par shes pas
K10D0154_H0155:306b-3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K10D0154_H0155:306b-4: chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro
K10D0154_H0155:306b-6: 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10D0154_H0155:306b-7: mkhas pas bsngags pa'i chos bzhi thob bo //
K10D0154_H0155:306b-9: 'di lta ste; dbang po sdom pa dang /
K10D0154_H0155:306b-10: rgod pa las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /
K10D0154_H0155:306b-11: 'jig rten thams cad kyis bsngags pa dang /
K10D0154_H0155:306b-14: 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10D0154_H0155:306b-15: mkhas pas bsngags pa'i chos bzhi po de dag thob bo //
K10D0154_H0155:306b-16: 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa spangs pa'i dge
K10D0154_H0155:306b-17: ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa
K10D0154_H0155:306b-18: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
K10D0154_H0155:306b-19: bsngo na / de dge ba'i rtsa ba des skyes
K10D0154_H0155:306b-20: bu chen po'i mtshan mdo mas kyi sba ba sbubs
K10D0154_H0155:306b-23: brtsun du smra ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10D0154_H0155:306b-25: mis pa sngags pa'i chos brgyad thob bo //
K10D0154_H0155:306b-28: autpal la'i dri 'byung bas kha yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0154_H0155:306b-29: 'jig rten thams cad kyi tshad mar 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0154_H0155:306b-31: mi dgang bas dbang gcig por 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0154_H0155:306b-32: dbugs 'byin pas 'byung po rnams dogs pa med par 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0154_H0155:307a-1: pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pas lus dang /
K10D0154_H0155:307a-3: sems yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0154_H0155:307a-4: tshig 'khrul pa med pas mchog tu dga' ba mang bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0154_H0155:307a-5: tshig gzung bar 'os pas ngag mnyan par 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0154_H0155:307a-6: shes rab thob pas lha dang /
K10D0154_H0155:307a-7: mi rnams kyi nang du kha na ma thob med par 'gyur ba yin te /
K10D0154_H0155:307a-9: brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10D0154_H0155:307a-11: mis bsngags pa'i chos brgyad po de dag thob bo //
K10D0154_H0155:307a-12: brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
K10D0154_H0155:307a-13: de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par
K10D0154_H0155:307a-14: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
K10D0154_H0155:307a-15: de dge ba'i rtsa ba des bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i tshig tu 'gyur ro //
K10D0154_H0155:307a-17: phra ma'i tshig spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10D0154_H0155:307a-18: mi phyed pa lnga thob bo //
K10D0154_H0155:307a-21: gzhan gyi gnod pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad las shin
K10D0154_H0155:307a-22: tu 'da' bas lus mi phyed pa thob pa dang
K10D0154_H0155:307a-23: / gzhan dag ga la chags pa med pas g-yog mi phyed pa thob pa dang /
K10D0154_H0155:307a-24: las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pas dad pa mi phyed pa thob pa dang /
K10D0154_H0155:307a-25: sgrub pa snying por byed pas chos las mi phyed pa thob pa dang /
K10D0154_H0155:307a-26: mi slu bas mdza' bo mi phyed pa thob pa ste /
K10D0154_H0155:307a-28: phra ma'i tshig spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10D0154_H0155:307a-29: mi phyed pa lnga po de dag thob bo //
K10D0154_H0155:307b-0: phra ma'i tshig spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba @307b
K10D0154_H0155:307b-1: de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par
K10D0154_H0155:307b-2: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
K10D0154_H0155:307b-3: de dge ba'i rtsa ba des g-yog mi phyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur te /
K10D0154_H0155:307b-5: phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'khor dbye bar mi nus so //
K10D0154_H0155:307b-7: tshig rtsub po spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10D0154_H0155:307b-8: ngag gi las yongs su dag pa brgyad thob bo; ;brgyad gang zhe na /
K10D0154_H0155:307b-16: skye bo mang po dga' ba'i tshig dang /
K10D0154_H0155:307b-17: ma smad pa'i tshig yin te /
K10D0154_H0155:307b-19: tshig rtsub po spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10D0154_H0155:307b-20: ngag gi las yongs su dag pa brgyad po de dag thob bo //
K10D0154_H0155:307b-21: tshig rtsub po spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de
K10D0154_H0155:307b-22: gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
K10D0154_H0155:307b-23: pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
K10D0154_H0155:307b-24: de dge ba'i rtsa ba des de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0154_H0155:307b-25: tshangs pa'i sgra skad bsgrags pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro
K10D0154_H0155:307b-27: tshig kyal pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10D0154_H0155:307b-28: gcig tu nges pa gsum thob bo //
K10D0154_H0155:307b-31: tshig ran pas mkhas pa rnams gcig tu nges par dga' ba dang /
K10D0154_H0155:307b-32: lan legs par lon pas gcig tu nges par de'i blo bden pa la 'gro ba dang /
K10D0154_H0155:307b-33: bcos ma ma yin par mdza' bas gcig tu nges par lha dang /
K10D0154_H0155:308a-0: @308a *// mi'i che ba nyid thob pa yin te /
K10D0154_H0155:308a-2: tshig kyal ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10D0154_H0155:308a-3: gcig tu nges pa gsum po de dag thob bo //
K10D0154_H0155:308a-4: tshig kyal pa spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de
K10D0154_H0155:308a-5: gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
K10D0154_H0155:308a-6: pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /
K10D0154_H0155:308a-7: de dge ba'i rtsa ba des phyad par lung ston
K10D0154_H0155:308a-8: cing gzhan du mi gsung ba'i de bzhin gshegs par
K10D0154_H0155:308a-10: brnab sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10D0154_H0155:308a-14: dbang po ma tshad pa med pas lus dang /
K10D0154_H0155:308a-16: sems la dbang pa thob pa dang /
K10D0154_H0155:308a-17: dgra thams cad kyis mi rdzibs longs spyod dang /
K10D0154_H0155:308a-18: dbang phyug la dbang ba rgya chen po slob pa dang /
K10D0154_H0155:308a-19: bsod nams kyi dbang gis de'i sems longs spyod dang /
K10D0154_H0155:308a-20: yongs su spyod pa rgya chen po thams cad la 'gro ba dang /
K10D0154_H0155:308a-21: dgab pa mchog thob pas rgyal po dang /
K10D0154_H0155:308a-23: sngon phrag dog med pas longs spyod ji ltar smon
K10D0154_H0155:308a-24: pa rnams de las stong phrag brgya 'gyur du khyad
K10D0154_H0155:308a-25: par du 'gyur ba thob pa ste /
K10D0154_H0155:308a-27: brnab sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10D0154_H0155:308a-28: dbang po lnga po de dag thob bo //
K10D0154_H0155:308a-29: brnab sems spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal
K10D0154_H0155:308a-30: te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
K10D0154_H0155:308a-31: byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /

K10D0154_H0155:308b-1: gyis mchod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa gcig
K10D0154_H0155:308b-3: gnod sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /
K10D0154_H0155:308b-4: yid bde bar byed pa'i chos brgyad thob bo //
K10D0154_H0155:308b-7: de'i sems rnam par mi 'tshe ba la 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /

K10D0154_H0155:308b-13: pa'i sems pan pa'i dngos po mang bar 'gyur ba
K10D0154_H0155:308b-14: dang / bde ba la mngon par dga' zhing dang
K10D0154_H0155:308b-15: ba mang la skye bo mang pos bsti stang bya

K10D0154_H0155:308b-24: byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na /

K10D0154_H0155:308b-29: yon tan gyi chos bcu thob bo //
K10D0154_H0155:309a-2: bsam pa dge bar 'gyur zhing grogs po dge ba rnyed par 'gyur ba yin /
K10D0154_H0155:309a-3: las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pas
K10D0154_H0155:309a-4: srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi byed pa

K10D0154_H0155:309a-8: gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa grogs su mi 'gyur ba yin /

K10D0154_H0155:309a-15: log par lta ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni /

K10D0154_H0155:309a-22: pa myur pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //

K10D0154_H0155:309b-2: byang chub kyi bar gyi rtsa ba dang /

K10D0154_H0155:311a-18: skad smras pa de bzhin byed de yi dam la

K10D0154_H0155:311b-25: dbang po ma tshang ba med par 'gyur ro //

K10D0154_H0155:312a-0: sangs rgyas la dad cing yang dag par lta @312a *//

K10D0154_H0155:312a-5: byang chub sems bskyed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro //

K10D0154_H0155:312a-14: sangs rgyas kyi dbyings yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //

K10D0154_H0155:312b-27: chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
K10D0154_H0155:312b-28: du khong du chud pa'i shes rab dag ye shes
K10D0154_H0155:312b-29: su 'gyur ro // thabs kyis brgyan na /
K10D0154_H0155:312b-31: 'dus ma byas kyi bde ba thob par 'gyur ro //

K10D0154_H0155:312b-35: mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa dang /
K10D0154_H0155:312b-36: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob
K10D0154_H0155:312b-37: pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar
K10D0154_H0155:313a-0: dag thob pa yongs su rdzogs par @313a *//
K10D0154_H0155:313a-4: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag rgya cher
K10D0154_H0155:313a-5: rnam par dbyebs brgyan pa'i phyir brtson par gyis shig
K10D0154_H0155:313a-8: dper na; sa la gnas pa'i grong dang /
K10D0154_H0155:313a-13: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad dang /
K10D0154_H0155:313a-18: las kyi mtha' thams cad dang /
K10D0154_H0155:313a-19: sa bon gyi tshogs thams cad dang /
K10D0154_H0155:313a-21: lo tog thams cad skyed pa dang /
K10D0154_H0155:313a-22: rmo ba brko ba bya ba 'byung ba de dag gi gnas ni /

K10D0154_H0155:313a-28: mi slob pa'i 'bras bu rnyed pa dang /
K10D0154_H0155:313a-30: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /
K10D0154_H0155:313a-32: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rten

K10D0154_H0155:313a-35: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /
K10D0154_H0155:313a-37: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K10D0154_H0155:313a-38: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /

K10D0154_H0155:313b-0: // //// @313b rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K10D0154_H0155:313b-3: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sde
K10D0154_H0155:313b-4: la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad
